This page covers biological details of component Pontine Reticulotegmental Nucleus.
Region is part of aHuman target integrated biological model.

  * *Top-down path to region*: Hindbrain Metencephalon -> Pontine Reticular Formation (HP.RF) -> Pontine Reticular Formation, Lateral Column (HP.RF.LAT) -> Pontine Reticulotegmental Nucleus (LLC.HP.PRF.PDT) (see [OverallMindMaps Mind Maps])
  * *Type*: nucleus
  * *Brain area*: [BrainAreaLLC Lower Brain - Locomotion Control Area]
  * *Role*: relay
  * *Function*: Mediate saccadic eye movements
  * *Notes to function*: Inactivation leads to deficit of expression, but not learning
